description: The Nordwand Advanced hooded hardshell jacket is a practical all-rounder for tackling a whole range of alpine challenges. It delivers all the features you would expect a hardshell jacket to offer for your mountain excursions – lightweight, durable and extra breathable. The innovative design of the cut is optimized to allow the full range of alpine maneuvers. Combined with the new GORE-TEX® PRO technology, it guarantees an excellent range of motion when climbing. Reliable, lasting protection from the elements. Incredibly breathable. The Nordwand Advanced strikes the right balance between weather protection, features and pack volume. Perfect for a whole spectrum of alpine adventures.
name: Mammut Nordwand Advanced HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
